item.title: Pentagon Papers Declassified and Released
item.description: Department of Defense report on Vietnam released in its entirety 40 years after portions were leaked to the press.

item.title: USCIS Releases Immigration File of John Lennon
item.description: The U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services has released hundreds of pages of documents relating to the late John Lennon.

item.title: NRC Issues Summary of Recent U.S. Nuclear Plant Inspections
item.description: Inspections were conducted at all 104 of the nuclear power plants operating in the U.S.

item.title: ODNI Releases Intelligence Community Directives, Policy Guidance, and Policy Memoranda
item.description: Dozens of memoranda released on how the relatively new agency was established.

item.title: CIA Declassifies Oldest Documents in U.S. Government Collection
item.description: The six documents released by the CIA all date from World War One, and describe secret writing techniques.

item.title: FBI Unveils New Online Records Center â€“ The Vault
item.description: New FBI Electronic Records Center, now containing more than 2,000 documents available online.

item.title: NTSB Releases Information Regarding Ted Stevens Plane Crash
item.description: NTSB releases accident docket containing factual reports on the 2010 plane crash in Alaska.

item.title: USCIS Releases the Immigration File of John Lennon
item.description: USCIS releases hundreds of pages on the visa application and immigration process of the former Beatle.

item.title: NSA Releases Documents Related to the Cuban Missile Crisis
item.description: NSA releases formally classified and declassified documents related to the October 1962 crisis.

item.title: U.S. Secret Service Releases Documents of the Reagan Assassination Attempt
item.description: Audio files, Transcripts and Interview reports concerning the March 30, 1981 attempt have been made available.
